scripts.backup: npm run backup-development && npm run backup-staging && npm run backup-main && npm run backup-alternative
scripts.content-copy-main-to-staging:replace: npm run backup-staging && npm run backup-main && npm run copy-main-to-staging:replace
scripts.content-copy-main-to-staging:missing: npm run backup-staging && npm run backup-main && npm run copy-main-to-staging:missing
scripts.content-copy-main-to-alternative:replace: npm run backup-alternative && npm run backup-main && npm run copy-main-to-alternative:replace
scripts.content-copy-main-to-alternative:missing: npm run backup-alternative && npm run backup-main && npm run copy-main-to-alternative:missing
scripts.content-copy-staging-to-development:repl: npm run backup-development && npm run backup-staging && npm run copy-staging-to-development:replace
scripts.content-copy-staging-to-development:miss: npm run backup-development && npm run backup-staging && npm run copy-staging-to-development:missing
